programme.desc: Jeanne, une gendarme incorruptible et ambitieuse va se retrouver entrainée dans une sombre magouille, entre son supérieur, l'adjudant-chef Paul Belmart et les frères Gutowski, des tocards de la mafia vosgienne, qui viennent de dérober 50 000 francs..

programme.title: Arctic Circle
programme.desc: En Laponie finlandaise, l'inspectrice Nina Kautsalo retrouve une prostituée russe en état d'hypothermie au fond d'une cave. Les analyses de sang de la victime indiquent qu'elle est porteuse d'un virus mortel.

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The Last Watch
Game of Thrones – The Last Watch
programme.desc:
Game of Thrones: The Last Watch: Directed by Jeanie Finlay. With Kevin Alexander, Alfie Allen, Jacob Anderson, Gethin Anthony. Chronicling the creation of Game of Thrones (2011)'s final season, its most ambitious and complicated one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10090796/","name":"Game of Thrones: The Last Watch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdlMzQzNDQtNTAxMS00NTMyLTgxYTAtYzQ0OGI1YzZhY2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Chronicling the creation of Game of Thrones (2011)'s final season, its most ambitious and complicated one.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10090796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"manuel_medeiros"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Does not live up to the potential given it is making off of one of the best shows of all time","reviewBody":"Given were talking about one of the best shows ever in the history of television I think behind the scenes documentary for the last season would have enormous potential And I can say that in my view The Last Watch fails to live up to their potential

Why? Firstly because you would want to hear from the main actors and from the writers - controversy aside - the producers, etc. Instead, most of the time is focused on a prosthetic artist (sure, she has a struggle by being away from their family but waay too much time is spent on this) and believe it or not on the Head of Snow, yes the person responsiblee for coordinating the amount of snow in each of the scenes

Obviously these people are important for the show and convey the amount of man hours and work that going it to making, but it is not the ones I would like to hear from when such an epic journey reaches its final Destination

HBO had a small chance of giving a treat to some of the fans that were disappointed by season 8 and in my view failed to seize the opportunity

Why? Firstly because you would want to hear from the main actors and from the writers - controversy aside - the producers, etc. Instead, most of the time is focused on a prosthetic artist (sure, she has a struggle by being away from their family but waay too much time is spent on this) and believe it or not on the Head of Snow, yes the person responsiblee for coordinating the amount of snow in each of the scenes

Obviously these people are important for the show and convey the amount of man hours and work that going it to making, but it is not the ones I would like to hear from when such an epic journey reaches its final Destination

HBO had a small chance of giving a treat to some of the fans that were disappointed by season 8 and in my view failed to seize the opportunity

6 out of 10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6052,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2019-05-26","keywords":"retrospective,reminiscence,behind the scenes,making of,clip show","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2313796633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE2MmY5ZjItNjViMy00YTA2LThmZjUtYTQwNGUxNTFkN2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE2MmY5ZjItNjViMy00YTA2LThmZjUtYTQwNGUxNTFkN2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"A farewell to Westeros with the people who built the realm. programme.title: Thronecast
programme.desc: In der von Sue Perkins und Jamie East präsentieren britischen Talkshow dreht sich alles um die Kultserie "Game of Thrones". Die Sendungen sind jeweils eine Stunde lang und enthalten Interviews mit Mitgliedern der Besetzung und der Crew. Zudem werden die bislang gelaufenen Episoden der Serie analysiert und es wird darüber spekuliert, was sich in der nächsten Folge ereignen könnte.

programme.title: Thronecast

Zudem werden die bislang gelaufenen Episoden der Serie analysiert und es wird darüber spekuliert, was sich in der nächsten Folge ereignen könnte.

Why? Firstly because you would want to hear from the main actors and from the writers - controversy aside - the producers, etc. Instead, most of the time is focused on a prosthetic artist (sure, she has a struggle by being away from their family but waay too much time is spent on this) and believe it or not on the Head of Snow, yes the person responsiblee for coordinating the amount of snow in each of the scenes

Obviously these people are important for the show and convey the amount of man hours and work that going it to making, but it is not the ones I would like to hear from when such an epic journey reaches its final Destination

HBO had a small chance of giving a treat to some of the fans that were disappointed by season 8 and in my view failed to seize the opportunity

An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2402157/","name":"The November Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzMDk5NjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMwOTMyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2402157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"beef-638-121436"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie, don't listen to the haters. It takes a bit of intelligence to follow the story. They just couldn't cut it.","reviewBody":"I am reading so many negative reviews on this movie, but they are clearly caused by poor judgment and lack of attention.

The story builds up nicely. The characters aren't underdeveloped at all. However, that character development happens mostly in the last 20 minutes or so. This is a movie that is unfolding through several threads, coming together at the end, clarifying the characters.

I do not need to add any words about the plot. It may seem puzzling to those who are used to be fed the cliché clues, overstating what comes next, but I think it was a very good plot and well executed. True, there should have been some more depth in the acting to enjoy but that would contradict the cold professionalism which is inherent to CIA, hit men and war criminals.

I say, make sure your IQ is three digits worth and enjoy this movie which does evoke 007 much, but harsher.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":66585,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-08-27","keywords":"stripper,premarital sex,sex standing up,sex scene,belgrade serbia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3721243673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

programme.title: Ironclad
Ironclad – Bis zum letzten Krieger
programme.desc:
Ironclad: Directed by Jonathan English. With James Purefoy, Brian Cox, Kate Mara, Derek Jacobi. In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1233301/","name":"Ironclad","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI1NTU2NTI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDYzOTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In thirteenth-century England, a Knights Templar and a few of the Barons men fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1233301/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ced_yuen"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Mud, blood and lots of ambition","reviewBody":"There are plenty of lower-budget independent films that have gone on to be more critically acclaimed and more financially profitable than big-budget Hollywood pictures. What is rare, however, is an indie film that masquerades as one of these pictures. A self-labelled "all- star indie action blockbuster" and "inspired by history",'Ironclad' is such a film, trying to redefine the boundaries of British cinema.

Whether by intention or by coincidence, 'Ironclad' picks up a few years after the end of Ridley Scott's 'Robin Hood'. It is England, 1215. King John (Paul Giamatti) has been forced to sign the Magna Carta, which limits his power and ensures the freedom of men.

With the help of a Danish army, the King rampages across the country to regain absolute power. Baron Albany (Brian Cox) and a band of rebels take Rochester Castle in an attempt to stop the tyrant king. A siege takes place, and the rebels must hold the castle until reinforcements arrive.

The film certainly ticks many of the boxes of an action blockbuster. There's a clear "big bad guy vs. underdog good guy" vibe, plenty of action, and some veterans among the B-list cast. The $25 million budget, although pocket change in Hollywood, shows how badly this indie film wants to be big. A big film, however, is not necessarily a good film.

'Ironclad' is at its strongest when it comes to the physical side of things. It does not shy away from gory violence. Heads, hands and feet go flying, blood splatters all over the the camera's lens, and there's a particularly nasty bit involving a man and a catapult. The weapons feel like instruments of destruction rather than Medieval-chic accessories, and often succeed in making viewers wince.

The fight choreography is particularly impressive - characters look like soldiers trying to tear each others' hearts out, as opposed to actors trying to high-five each other's swords. The action sacrifices style and appearance for physicality and brutality, which results in a refreshing level of authenticity.

The 13th century England recreated looks good enough to fool anyone but a history buff. Giamatti and Cox play their roles with conviction and succeed in getting the story moving. Giamatti is particularly watchable, playing King John as an unhinged sadist.

The narrative is where 'Ironclad' falters. Fully aware that the film is essentially about a group of soldiers in a building, the writers have tried to spice things up. One of the rebels (James Purefoy) happens to be a Templar Knight. He regrets killing people for God, so he goes on a diet of silence and chastity, the latter of which is tested (of course) by the lady of the castle (Kate Mara). These are ill-advised attempts at emotional content and only serve to distract from what should have been a simpler, more polished affair.

Regrettably, the filmmakers decided to emulate that most repulsive staple of modern action blockbusters - the shaky-cam. Specifically namechecking 'Transformers 2' and the 'Bourne' sequels as influences (not a good sign), they decided to shake the picture to create "a very real sense of action". 

What is achieved instead is a very real sense of frustration every time the action is made unnecessarily incoherent. Once again, the "Michael Bay Effect" has ruined a film that would have otherwise looked excellent, and wasted the work of an obviously talented action choreographer.

Despite its flaws, fans of mud'n'blood, hack'n'slash mini-epics will find plenty to like in 'Ironclad'. It is comparable to 'Robin Hood' despite costing $130 million less to make. Director Jonathan English wanted to create an action blockbuster. In terms of scale and ambition, he has succeeded. But blockbusters aren't perfect, and neither is this."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":41526,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2011-03-04","keywords":"13th century,england,knight,castle,king","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ironclad","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4273052697","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Mzk5NDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIxNTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1Mzk5NDgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjIxNTI1NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 13th century, a determined group of Knights Templar defends Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316079/","name":"Paul Giamatti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002076/","name":"Jason Flemyng"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0238245/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143763/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170376/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440936/","name":"Erick Kastel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1893753/","name":"Stephen McDool"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hacksaw Ridge
Hacksaw Ridge – Die Entscheidung
programme.desc:
Hacksaw Ridge: Directed by Mel Gibson. With Andrew Garfield, Richard Pyros, Jacob Warner, Milo Gibson. World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2119532/","name":"Hacksaw Ridge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1NjM3MTUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc5MTY5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2119532/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DukeEman"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Back on the battlefield with Mel...","reviewBody":"I was lucky enough to sneak into a cast & crew screening at the Newtown Dendy cinema. I thought 10.30AM on a Sunday was too early for a Mel Gibson movie, that I might be in for something along the lines of the heavy-handedness of THE PASSION OF THE Christ, and the adrenaline pumped brilliance of APOCALYPTO.

I was proved wrong because after the first thirty minutes I wasn't sure if this was a Mel Gibson film when I was placed into a comfort zone, with its melodrama set in a small Virginia town during the Forties, a schmaltzy romance, and the cliché violent drunken father who survived a brutal war. The performances were maybe a little let down by the clumsy dialogue, but all directed safely with a natural sense of storytelling.

By the 2nd act, I was put on high alert in the military training with our protagonist, Desmond Doss (Andrew Garfield who I at first felt was wrongly cast, but he really came through in the end). It was here when the true purpose of the story began to evolve, that of Doss' moral and internal conflict with using a gun! What he had to endure and stand-up for was a courage I greatly admired. It was also in this phase of the film that the dialogue and characters began to shine. Maybe it was the introduction of Vince Vaughn's character. We all know how Vaughn is notorious in ad-libbing, and it seemed to help because the other actors bounced off it well.

Now the story had me in their pocket because by the 3rd act I was with our protagonist and his platoon when they got to the battlefield graveyard of Hacksaw Ridge. You thought the horrific situation in WE WERE SOLDIERS was brutal, well this was captured so vividly that you felt you were there. It was almost on par with the brilliance of GAME OF THRONES; BATTLE OF THE BASTARDS.

Now I felt I was in a Mel Gibson film. As with Braveheart, the battle scenes in Hacksaw Ridge didn't hold back. Maybe a notch better because of today's CGI (and I didn't even notice the effects!). The scenes were unflinching, haunting and in your face. Possibly showing you the true horror of war. Definitely not for the squeamish.

The religious aspect of the film was relevant to the story, so as a non-believer I thought it was an integral part of the protagonist and had to be told, so it didn't bother me as much.

Overall the technical aspect of the film was brilliant, but then again I didn't really notice it because I was too distracted by the story and the characters, and when that occurs, I know the film has succeeded.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":480217,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2016-11-03","keywords":"world war two,conscientious objector,soldier,medic,1940s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2608248601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzNTI5MzQ1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTc3OTY1OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzNTI5MzQ1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTc3OTY1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Hacksaw Ridge' is the true story of Desmond Doss who, in Okinawa during the bloodiest battle of WWII, saved 75 men without firing or carrying a gun. He was the only American soldier in WWII to fight on the front lines without a weapon, as he believed that while the war was justified, killing was nevertheless wrong. As an army medic, he single-handedly evacuated the wounded from behind enemy lines, braved fire while tending to soldiers and was wounded by a grenade and hit by snipers. Doss was the first conscientious objector awarded the Congressional Medal of Honor."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1940449/","name":"Andrew Garfield"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941777/","name":"Sam Worthington"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3478396/","name":"Luke Bracey"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285648/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0317576/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770938/","name":"Robert Schenkkan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460795/","name":"Andrew Knight"}],"duration":"PT2H19M"}</script><metacontent="

World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2119532/","name":"Hacksaw Ridge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1NjM3MTUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc5MTY5OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2119532/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"DukeEman","dateCreated":"2016-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Back on the battlefield with Mel...","reviewBody":"I was lucky enough to sneak into a cast & crew screening at the Newtown Dendy cinema. I thought 10.30AM on a Sunday was too early for a Mel Gibson movie, that I might be in for something along the lines of the heavy-handedness of THE PASSION OF THE Christ, and the adrenaline pumped brilliance of APOCALYPTO.

I was proved wrong because after the first thirty minutes I wasn't sure if this was a Mel Gibson film when I was placed into a comfort zone, with its melodrama set in a small Virginia town during the Forties, a schmaltzy romance, and the cliché violent drunken father who survived a brutal war. The performances were maybe a little let down by the clumsy dialogue, but all directed safely with a natural sense of storytelling.

By the 2nd act, I was put on high alert in the military training with our protagonist, Desmond Doss (Andrew Garfield who I at first felt was wrongly cast, but he really came through in the end). It was here when the true purpose of the story began to evolve, that of Doss' moral and internal conflict with using a gun! What he had to endure and stand-up for was a courage I greatly admired. It was also in this phase of the film that the dialogue and characters began to shine. Maybe it was the introduction of Vince Vaughn's character. We all know how Vaughn is notorious in ad-libbing, and it seemed to help because the other actors bounced off it well.

Now the story had me in their pocket because by the 3rd act I was with our protagonist and his platoon when they got to the battlefield graveyard of Hacksaw Ridge. You thought the horrific situation in WE WERE SOLDIERS was brutal, well this was captured so vividly that you felt you were there. It was almost on par with the brilliance of GAME OF THRONES; BATTLE OF THE BASTARDS.

Now I felt I was in a Mel Gibson film. As with Braveheart, the battle scenes in Hacksaw Ridge didn't hold back. Maybe a notch better because of today's CGI (and I didn't even notice the effects!). The scenes were unflinching, haunting and in your face. Possibly showing you the true horror of war. Definitely not for the squeamish.

The religious aspect of the film was relevant to the story, so as a non-believer I thought it was an integral part of the protagonist and had to be told, so it didn't bother me as much.

Overall the technical aspect of the film was brilliant, but then again I didn't really notice it because I was too distracted by the story and the characters, and when that occurs, I know the film has succeeded.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":480217,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2016-11-03","keywords":"world war two,conscientious objector,soldier,medic,1940s","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2608248601","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzNTI5MzQ1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTc3OTY1OTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAzNTI5MzQ1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTc3OTY1OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Hacksaw Ridge' is the true story of Desmond Doss who, in Okinawa during the bloodiest battle of WWII, saved 75 men without firing or carrying a gun. He was the only American soldier in WWII to fight on the front lines without a weapon, as he believed that while the war was justified, killing was nevertheless wrong. As an army medic, he single-handedly evacuated the wounded from behind enemy lines, braved fire while tending to soldiers and was wounded by a grenade and hit by snipers. Doss was the first conscientious objector awarded the Congressional Medal of Honor.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1940449/","name":"Andrew Garfield","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941777/","name":"Sam Worthington","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3478396/","name":"Luke Bracey"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046206/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0285648/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0317576/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770938/","name":"Robert Schenkkan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460795/","name":"Andrew Knight"],"duration":"PT2H19M"</script><metacontent="

A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7737786/","name":"Greenland","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzcyMzU4MDUtM2JhOC00ZDg2LTg5MGMtZjc2OGMyMjhlMGE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7737786/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"carrandas"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Where's Bruce Willis when you need him?","reviewBody":"The planet is about to be destroyed by an asteroid and we only have x hours before it strikes. I expected them to call Bruce Willis again to do some off-world digging but he must be under house arrest.

We're following Gerard Butler and his family as they try to get to a safe place in Greenland while the world around them turns into chaos. Other people seem to put more efforts into looting shops for toilet paper or holding end-of-the-world parties making their route a bit like the Road.

Gerard trying to save his family and driving his ridiculously oversized car through meteoroids: it's all forget-about-corona-for-two-hours mindless fun!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104255,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-12-18","keywords":"natural disaster,disaster film,looting,greenland,apocalypse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2720317721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk1MzdlZTktMzc1Yi00YmQxLTgyMzctM2JkM2U4Mzc0OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDk1MzdlZTktMzc1Yi00YmQxLTgyMzctM2JkM2U4Mzc0OTFjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family struggles for survival in the face of a cataclysmic natural disaster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1072555/","name":"Morena Baccarin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9819444/","name":"Roger Dale Floyd"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006846/","name":"Ric Roman Waugh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0699213/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0413801/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0172670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2133655/","name":"Chris Sparling"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The November Man
The November Man
programme.desc:
The November Man: Directed by Roger Donaldson. With Pierce Brosnan, Luke Bracey, Olga Kurylenko, Bill Smitrovich. An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2402157/","name":"The November Man","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTkzMDk5NjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMwOTMyMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-C.I.A. operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level C.I.A. officials and the Russian President-elect.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2402157/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"beef-638-121436"},"dateCreated":"2014-11-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie, don't listen to the haters. It takes a bit of intelligence to follow the story. They just couldn't cut it.","reviewBody":"I am reading so many negative reviews on this movie, but they are clearly caused by poor judgment and lack of attention.

The story builds up nicely. The characters aren't underdeveloped at all. However, that character development happens mostly in the last 20 minutes or so. This is a movie that is unfolding through several threads, coming together at the end, clarifying the characters.

I do not need to add any words about the plot. It may seem puzzling to those who are used to be fed the cliché clues, overstating what comes next, but I think it was a very good plot and well executed. True, there should have been some more depth in the acting to enjoy but that would contradict the cold professionalism which is inherent to CIA, hit men and war criminals.

I say, make sure your IQ is three digits worth and enjoy this movie which does evoke 007 much, but harsher.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":66585,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-08-27","keywords":"stripper,premarital sex,sex standing up,sex scene,belgrade serbia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3721243673","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2NTAxMjUwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjY4NTIzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-CIA operative is brought back in on a very personal mission and finds himself pitted against his former pupil in a deadly game involving high level CIA officials and the Russian president-elect.

programme.title: Spy
Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc:
Spy: Directed by Paul Feig. With Jude Law, Raad Rawi, Melissa McCarthy, Jessica Chaffin. A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3079380/","name":"Spy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI5OTQ0MDQxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcwNjMyNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3079380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"silvermistvio"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Less serious spy film.","reviewBody":"Spy is a flim produced in 2015. Normally, I don't really watch old films. But I watched it anyway. The reason why I watched this film was because of Jude Law. Recently, I watched Contagion which was also Jude Law was in. And then I found out this film. Plus, I saw this one on a website and I felt like it's going to be a good film, so, I chose to watch it.

The film is basically fine. And it's funny. But some of the words and actions are unbearable. So, I closed my eyes when those scenes came. I even felt like ashamed. And also there are a lot of f words which make me uncomfortable to listen to. Moreover, I feel like it's kind of copied from James Bond's films. Maybe it's because of the theme song part. That scene reminded me of James Bond films.

That being said, this film makes a good one because it's all about actions and CIA things. Maybe that was also the reason why I watched this one. The actions are cool and some scenes are amazing. I kind of loved it.

To say it in overall, this film is a little bit less serious. But it's so much fun. Hence, it's not that much a great film but enjoyable and watchable. I kind of enjoyed it because it's full of funny things. But for some reasons that made me not to like this film that much, I only gave this one 5 stars.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":239121,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-06-05","keywords":"fellatio,prosthetic penis,vulgarity,hit in the crotch,male nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi707571993","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ3MjkyNTIxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUyMTExNTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQ3MjkyNTIxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODUyMTExNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0565250/","name":"Melissa McCarthy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0126284/","name":"Rose Byrne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000179/","name":"Jude Law"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082450/","name":"Paul Feig"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0409029/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082450/","name":"Paul Feig"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ironclad: Battle for Blood
Ironclad 2 – Bis aufs Blut
programme.desc:
Ironclad: Battle for Blood: Directed by Jonathan English. With Michelle Fairley, Roxanne McKee, Rosie Day, Danny Webb. A survivor of the Great Siege of Rochester Castle fights to save his clan from Celtic raiders. A sequel to the 2011 film, "Ironclad."" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2404583/","name":"Ironclad: Battle for Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5MTc4NjU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMzIxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A survivor of the Great Siege of Rochester Castle fights to save his clan from Celtic raiders. A sequel to the 2011 film, "Ironclad."","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2404583/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thomas-446-105268"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good portrayal of medieval times","reviewBody":"This is not a Hollywood movie, and if you are looking for pretty cgi, this is not for you.

While the first movie was slightly better, this movie is actually a very good attempt to portray what medieval times would have been like.

It does not try to be an action movie. Instead the deeper underlying message is one about the futility of war and the fragility of life.

I would only recommend this movie if you are into the whole medieval theme, but considering the budget they did a good job at trying to tell a story that is not just about sword-fights. 

Its about men trying to live by honor and create a better future in times when civilization was but a vague concept.

If you can look past the low budget, this movie is a little gem. It does not try to be more then it is. It just tells events and how it affects the people involved in them.

You simply cannot compare this to large Hollywood productions, but it does a good job at portraying medieval times.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2666,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-03-14","keywords":"stabbed in the stomach,battleaxe,hit on the head,sequel,second part","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi611953177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NDI4ODI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NTYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NDI4ODI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NTYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gathered together by young Hubert (Tom Rhys Harries), a small band of hired swords gather inside his families castle intent on holding off evil Celtic Tribesmen hell-bent on revenge for the death of their leaders' son: a young mercenary named Guy (Tom Austen) whose soul is wracked with guilt over the atrocities he has committed during the days and years after the great battle of Rochester Castle and his burgeoning feelings for Kate, his cousin (Roxanne McKee), ; battle-hardened mercenaries such as Berenger (David Caves), who fight not for God and country for money and bloodlust.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265610/","name":"Michelle Fairley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1861467/","name":"Roxanne McKee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1133857/","name":"Rosie Day"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0238245/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0397115/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1893753/","name":"Stephen McDool"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 2404583, Title: Ironclad: Battle for Blood, --- Description: Ironclad: Battle for Blood: Directed by Jonathan English. With Michelle Fairley, Roxanne McKee, Rosie Day, Danny Webb. A survivor of the Great Siege of Rochester Castle fights to save his clan from Celtic raiders. A sequel to the 2011 film, "Ironclad."" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2404583/","name":"Ironclad: Battle for Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5MTc4NjU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMzIxMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A survivor of the Great Siege of Rochester Castle fights to save his clan from Celtic raiders. A sequel to the 2011 film, "Ironclad."","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2404583/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thomas-446-105268","dateCreated":"2014-07-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"A good portrayal of medieval times","reviewBody":"This is not a Hollywood movie, and if you are looking for pretty cgi, this is not for you.

While the first movie was slightly better, this movie is actually a very good attempt to portray what medieval times would have been like.

It does not try to be an action movie. Instead the deeper underlying message is one about the futility of war and the fragility of life.

I would only recommend this movie if you are into the whole medieval theme, but considering the budget they did a good job at trying to tell a story that is not just about sword-fights. 

Its about men trying to live by honor and create a better future in times when civilization was but a vague concept.

If you can look past the low budget, this movie is a little gem. It does not try to be more then it is. It just tells events and how it affects the people involved in them.

You simply cannot compare this to large Hollywood productions, but it does a good job at portraying medieval times.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2666,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4,"genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-03-14","keywords":"stabbed in the stomach,battleaxe,hit on the head,sequel,second part","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"International Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi611953177","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NDI4ODI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NTYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ5NDI4ODI4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTI4NTYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gathered together by young Hubert (Tom Rhys Harries), a small band of hired swords gather inside his families castle intent on holding off evil Celtic Tribesmen hell-bent on revenge for the death of their leaders' son: a young mercenary named Guy (Tom Austen) whose soul is wracked with guilt over the atrocities he has committed during the days and years after the great battle of Rochester Castle and his burgeoning feelings for Kate, his cousin (Roxanne McKee), ; battle-hardened mercenaries such as Berenger (David Caves), who fight not for God and country for money and bloodlust.
","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265610/","name":"Michelle Fairley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1861467/","name":"Roxanne McKee","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1133857/","name":"Rosie Day"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0238245/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374175/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0397115/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1893753/","name":"Stephen McDool","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0257646/","name":"Jonathan English"],"duration":"PT1H48M"</script><metacontent="

https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM5MTc4NjU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDgwMzIxMjE@._V1_QL75_UX190_CR0,0,190,281_.jpg

programme.title: The Last Legion
Die letzte Legion
programme.desc: The Last Legion: Directed by Doug Lefler. With Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Peter Mullan. As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462396/","name":"The Last Legion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJhOTMyMTMtMDc0Yi00YTg2LWE0MWUtYWY0OTBmZTMzMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462396/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Features exciting fighting scenes, impressive battles and fabulous costumes","reviewBody":"This is a nice production with an average budget, great sets and thundering battles about the fall of the Roman Empire. Although the complete Roman Empire decline and fall took centuries, by the end of fifth century it was simply a battleground for warring rival Caesars and Barbarians chiefs. The Germans gather, take over and pull down the Roman gates. The Goths commanded by Odoacer(Peter Mullan), king of Herulos, invade Rome(476 AD), assesinated Orestes(Iain Glen), father of emperor Romulus Augustulos (Thomas Sangster). The young Caesar is sent to Capri along with his preceptor Ambrosinus(Ben Kingsley). A motley group of soldiers led by loyal Aurelianus (Colin Firth) are assigned by senator Nestor (John Hannah) to free him. They're accompanied by a beautiful Indian warrior named Mira (Aishwarya Rai). Without another alternative, they travel to Britannia to meet the last legion, located near the Wall of Adriano; but they're pursued by relentless barbarians (Kevin McKidd, James Cosmo). Although the Romans had partially withdrawn from Britain and its politics essentially dissolved into chaos. Later on, it's thought that a minor war lord, probably named Artos, did his best to maintain civilization and Christianity in the west of England.\n\nThis is a larger-than-life production with good direction, interesting scripting, and enthusiastic performances place this far above the usual empty-headed historical spectacle. Several action scenes are outstanding with spectacular battle images and thrilling fights. Unfortunately, on small house screens much of the splendor will be lost. You will be left with the wooden Colin Firth and the gorgeous Aishwarya Rai in a love story that was underdeveloped due tho the film's emphasis on spectacle. The picture packs colorful cinematography by Pontecorvo and evocative musical score by Patrick Doyle. The flick is professionally directed by Doug Lefler, who previously made ¨Dragonheart , a new beginning ¨. Rating : Good, it's a nice extravaganza well set in ancient Rome, done in great scale and praised for its action sequences.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","War"],"datePublished":"2007-11-07","keywords":"roman legion,woman warrior,5th century,goths,catapult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last Legion","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2599747865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706787/","name":"Aishwarya Rai Bachchan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498991/","name":"Doug Lefler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137363/","name":"Carlo Carlei"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. This film should be on everyone's top ten list.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":529574,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"amnesia,secret past,money,assassin,dark past","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bourne Identity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi680919321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177933/","name":"Chris Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035615/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0380819/","name":"W. IMDb data; ttnr: 0258463, Title: The Bourne Identity, --- Description: The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4","dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. I especially liked the on-locale settings of Russia and Germany.

Jason Bourne is a walking CIA specimen whom the agency deems to dangerous to live. Not all the facts are known about some mysterious murders in Berlin but Jason Bourne is suspected. You know his idyllic life on a remote island will be blown from the first.

programme.title: Retroactive
Retroactive – Gefangene der Zeit
programme.desc:
Retroactive: Directed by Louis Morneau. With Jim Belushi, Kylie Travis, Shannon Whirry, Frank Whaley. A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117468/","name":"Retroactive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxODIwNDA3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDEyNzUyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bobcathy78"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"a better than average film","reviewBody":"I had picked up the DVD at a store not knowing much about the film, and was surprised that the film was as good as it was. I like Belushi. I think he played this part very well. I had never heard of Kylie Travis before, but I thought she was very good in this film. I thought she played the tough woman part well. I like the movies where there's a tough heroine. Like the Alien movies.

Of course, it didn't hurt that Kylie's good looking too. The plot was interesting. I won't divulge the rest of the movie, but suffice it to say, if someone likes adventure and science fiction together, this movie might fill the bill. If you find it at your local video store, I would suggest buying it and adding it to your collection.

My summary is that it's a better than average film. I recommend it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6103,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1997-01-01","keywords":"time travel,alternate timeline,crime of passion,race against time,rampage","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi670417689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ExNDVhOTktNTAyMy00OWRiLTgxMzMtMjlmMDNhZTBhYWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2ExNDVhOTktNTAyMy00OWRiLTgxMzMtMjlmMDNhZTBhYWU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000902/","name":"Jim Belushi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0871406/","name":"Kylie Travis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0924204/","name":"Shannon Whirry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007128/","name":"Louis Morneau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010022/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0358228/","name":"Michael Hamilton-Wright"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0833866/","name":"Robert Strauss"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046093/","name":"Phillip Badger"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Last Legion
Die letzte Legion
programme.desc: The Last Legion: Directed by Doug Lefler. With Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Peter Mullan. As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462396/","name":"The Last Legion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJhOTMyMTMtMDc0Yi00YTg2LWE0MWUtYWY0OTBmZTMzMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462396/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Features exciting fighting scenes, impressive battles and fabulous costumes","reviewBody":"This is a nice production with an average budget, great sets and thundering battles about the fall of the Roman Empire. Although the complete Roman Empire decline and fall took centuries, by the end of fifth century it was simply a battleground for warring rival Caesars and Barbarians chiefs. The Germans gather, take over and pull down the Roman gates. The Goths commanded by Odoacer(Peter Mullan), king of Herulos, invade Rome(476 AD), assesinated Orestes(Iain Glen), father of emperor Romulus Augustulos (Thomas Sangster). The young Caesar is sent to Capri along with his preceptor Ambrosinus(Ben Kingsley). A motley group of soldiers led by loyal Aurelianus (Colin Firth) are assigned by senator Nestor (John Hannah) to free him. They're accompanied by a beautiful Indian warrior named Mira (Aishwarya Rai). Without another alternative, they travel to Britannia to meet the last legion, located near the Wall of Adriano; but they're pursued by relentless barbarians (Kevin McKidd, James Cosmo). Although the Romans had partially withdrawn from Britain and its politics essentially dissolved into chaos. Later on, it's thought that a minor war lord, probably named Artos, did his best to maintain civilization and Christianity in the west of England.\n\nThis is a larger-than-life production with good direction, interesting scripting, and enthusiastic performances place this far above the usual empty-headed historical spectacle. Several action scenes are outstanding with spectacular battle images and thrilling fights. Unfortunately, on small house screens much of the splendor will be lost. You will be left with the wooden Colin Firth and the gorgeous Aishwarya Rai in a love story that was underdeveloped due tho the film's emphasis on spectacle. The picture packs colorful cinematography by Pontecorvo and evocative musical score by Patrick Doyle. The flick is professionally directed by Doug Lefler, who previously made ¨Dragonheart , a new beginning ¨. Rating : Good, it's a nice extravaganza well set in ancient Rome, done in great scale and praised for its action sequences.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","War"],"datePublished":"2007-11-07","keywords":"roman legion,woman warrior,5th century,goths,catapult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last Legion","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2599747865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706787/","name":"Aishwarya Rai Bachchan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498991/","name":"Doug Lefler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137363/","name":"Carlo Carlei"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:
The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. This film should be on everyone's top ten list.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":529574,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"amnesia,secret past,money,assassin,dark past","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bourne Identity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi680919321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177933/","name":"Chris Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035615/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0380819/","name":"W. programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
Die Bourne-Verschwörung
programme.desc:
The Bourne Supremacy: Directed by Paul Greengrass. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Brian Cox, Julia Stiles. When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0372183/","name":"The Bourne Supremacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIyMDFmMmItMWQzYy00MjBiLTg2M2UtM2JiNDRhOWE4NjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0372183/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pied"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superior Action Film...","reviewBody":"This is a superior action film with the added bonus of good acting by Joan Allen, Matt Damon, and Karl Urban among others. The camera work is amazing.

I especially liked the on-locale settings of Russia and Germany.

Jason Bourne is a walking CIA specimen whom the agency deems to dangerous to live. Not all the facts are known about some mysterious murders in Berlin but Jason Bourne is suspected. You know his idyllic life on a remote island will be blown from the first.

How this all is resolved takes the viewer on a non-stop chase through various foreign countries. 

Good flick!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":450534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-08-25","keywords":"hidden truth,suspense,secret past,dark past,amnesia","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

An FBI agent out for revenge pursues a notorious assassin named Rogue who's come to San Francisco to instigate a war between the Triads and the Yakuza. The storytelling is rather good, especially in creating suspense and intrigue. And, the fight sequences are particularly impressive. However, the characters aren't given much depth and seem more like stereotypes. programme.title: Death Wish 3
Death Wish III
programme.desc:
Death Wish 3: Directed by Michael Winner. With Charles Bronson, Deborah Raffin, Ed Lauter, Martin Balsam. Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089003/","name":"Death Wish 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE5MmNlMDktMmVmNC00M2VlLWJkNjItYzJjMzM4MDY5ODY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089003/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mr Parker"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Order your rocket launcher today!","reviewBody":"I'm having a lot of trouble trying to figure out how to rate this movie. As an actual film, it can't honestly score more than one star out of five. As pure cheese however, you'd have to give this movie a straight up five out of five.

This is probably one of the worst movies I have ever seen. The catch is, it's so bad that it's actually good. Make sense? The movie is infinitely rewatchable and you can always find something new to laugh at every time you pop this sucker in the player. There is very little to tell you about this movie other than if you haven't seen it, you need to. It's unbelievably violent and Ol' Chuck mows down at least a hundred gang members throughout the film's ninety minutes.

I can write an entire dissertation on this film but I've already seen it done on the Web on quite a few sites so I'm not going to bother. Just to remind you, the movie is so bad and unintentionally funny (watching the film again, it'd make sense if the filmmakers were going for laughs) that if you haven't seen it, you need to.

I'll leave you to ponder this one scene and decide for yourselves whether or not this movie is for you or not: Gang bikers come down the street. Angry civilians wait with a chain stretched across the road. Bikers come and are clotheslined off of their bikes when the chain is yanked upwards. While the bikers are on the floor, the civilians come out and shoot all of them, point blank while they lay writhing on the floor. Men, women and oh yes, children come out and join in the festivities, dancing around the dead bodies of the bikers.

Sigh. Instant classic.

RATING: * out of *****. 

SHLOCK-O-CHEESE RATING: ***** out of *****.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15207,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1985-11-01","keywords":"vigilante,woman in jeopardy,violence against women,rape victim,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Death Wish 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2012721689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3ODM1OWYtMGY2Ni00MTkwLTg2MjEtN2Y4NjY1MmZlNjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3ODM1OWYtMGY2Ni00MTkwLTg2MjEtN2Y4NjY1MmZlNjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Death Wish 3"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000314/","name":"Charles Bronson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706298/","name":"Deborah Raffin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491590/","name":"Ed Lauter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935382/","name":"Michael Winner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206391/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0415979/","name":"Don Jakoby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307257/","name":"Brian Garfield"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Silent Rage
Das stumme Ungeheuer
programme.desc: Silent Rage: Directed by Michael Miller. With Chuck Norris, Ron Silver, Steven Keats, Toni Kalem. A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084684/","name":"Silent Rage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk5NWYwNGUtYWJmZC00NDc2LTk0YzQtZWFmN2Q5MDQ2ZGFjL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084684/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Scars_Remain"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun but Sometimes Dull","reviewBody":"If you can get past the painfully slow and boring parts of this film, you should have a rather good time watching it much like I did. It's a fun little horror from the 80's with the ridiculous but hilarious Chuck Norris so of course, you can expect cheesy lines and poorly placed kung fu moves from him.\n\nI was actually surprised by some of the suspense in this film. They actually managed quite a bit of it. The story is pretty silly but it seems like every Chuck Norris movie has the same premise in a way: some sort of bad guy is terrorizing people and Chuck Norris has to fight him. The acting was pretty bad but I guess that's expected. Don't expect an Oscar worthy film from this but turn off your brain for 100 minutes and have a good time!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"datePublished":"1982-04-02","keywords":"slasher,two word title,face slap,fat man,sex scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi77251353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE4Nzc5OWQtYzdlYy00Njg4LWFlODctOTk3MDBkYzdiOTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE4Nzc5OWQtYzdlYy00Njg4LWFlODctOTk3MDBkYzdiOTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798779/","name":"Ron Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444198/","name":"Steven Keats"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588964/","name":"Michael Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070015/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289707/","name":"Joseph Fraley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0223988/","name":"Edward Di Lorenzo"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

It's a fun little horror from the 80's with the ridiculous but hilarious Chuck Norris so of course, you can expect cheesy lines and poorly placed kung fu moves from him.\n\nI was actually surprised by some of the suspense in this film. The story is pretty silly but it seems like every Chuck Norris movie has the same premise in a way: some sort of bad guy is terrorizing people and Chuck Norris has to fight him. The acting was pretty bad but I guess that's expected. Don't expect an Oscar worthy film from this but turn off your brain for 100 minutes and have a good time!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"datePublished":"1982-04-02","keywords":"slasher,two word title,face slap,fat man,sex scene","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi77251353","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE4Nzc5OWQtYzdlYy00Njg4LWFlODctOTk3MDBkYzdiOTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE4Nzc5OWQtYzdlYy00Njg4LWFlODctOTk3MDBkYzdiOTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798779/","name":"Ron Silver","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444198/","name":"Steven Keats"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588964/","name":"Michael Miller"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070015/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289707/","name":"Joseph Fraley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0223988/","name":"Edward Di Lorenzo"],"duration":"PT1H40M"</script><metacontent="
